mesquite.lib

Class MesquiteThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • mesquite.lib.MesquiteThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, CommandRecordHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandThread, MainThread, ProjectReadThread, PuppetThread

    public class MesquiteThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements CommandRecordHolder
    A thread for executing commands
